name: Bob's Odyssey
description:
It's a sunny Tuesday morning in Bob's hometown. Most importantly, it's the day that Bob will finally get his chance to apply for his dream job at The B-I-G Corporation. But things don't always go as plans. Soon he realized that no matter how much he might want something in life, sometimes things are OUT OF his CONTROL.


Created by LightBit Games for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Credits:

John Spantouris - Programming

Caterina Giamarellou - Logo, 2D

Angelo Tsiflas - 3D, Design

Instructions:
Move around with W/A/S/D
